text:
I stop using ChatGPT (because of Claude).

But you must set it up this (exact) way:

1. Go to claude.ai.
2. Choose "Opus 4.5" + Extended thinking.
3. Go to "Projects" and add your favorite texts.
4. Customize its instructions to match your style.
5. Step-by-step here: https://lnkd.in/e87Kdy5Z.

I am writing a newsletter to 200,000+ readers. 
And Claude is my biggest help in writing like me.

I just recorded a video on how I write with Claude right here (it's free): https://lnkd.in/e87Kdy5Z.

Lately, people are understanding AI is everywhere, and the "AI touch" in writing style is super annoying.

You must avoid sounding like an AI.

I wrote a guide here: https://lnkd.in/enzE6sF5.

But here's my guide to sound like you, with Claude:

1. Click on the "+" (bottom left of the chat).
2. Click on "Use style" > "Create & edit styles".
3. Click on the dark "Create custom style" button.
4. Add a writing example, or simply prompt your style.

You now have (1) a project, set up (2) your own style.

Combine the two, and you will always sound like you.

Because who cares if you're using AI?
↳ We want your opinion, with your own words. 

AI or not.
